short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to bookmark all your open tabs in a reference name, for your easy access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is totally understandable that trying to get the desired information while surfing the net might not be likely available in a single reference point. This results to referring  multiple pages and even 'N' number of tabs piled up. Tracking them mighty turn tricky and challenging. This can be sorted out by pinning ALL the relevant tabs under ONE title. This extension will serve the purpose and help you to achieve this hands down.
